name: part_001
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Vestia Zeta (Chibi) returns to the stage and talks to the viewers.
Zeta shows off the virtual stage and the 'audience'.
Zeta plays with a virtual selfie stick, leading to a dizzy accident.
Zeta puts on sunglasses and tries to 'rap'.
Zeta wears cat ears, dances, and talks about being a 'cat'.
Zeta prepares to introduce a special guest.

subtitles.original: Oh! Hello, I'm back chat.
